title: AdCP Agent Card Extension Params
description: Parameters for declaring AdCP support in agent discovery. For A2A, use in extensions[].params. For MCP, use in _meta['adcontextprotocol.org'].

adcp_version.description: Semantic version of the AdCP specification this agent implements (e.g., '2.5.0'). Extension schemas are versioned along with the AdCP spec.

protocols_supported.description: AdCP protocol domains supported by this agent. At least one must be specified.

extensions_supported.description: Typed extensions this agent supports. Each extension has a formal schema in /schemas/extensions/. Extension version is determined by adcp_version.

items.description: Extension namespace (e.g., 'sustainability'). Must be lowercase alphanumeric with underscores.
